reference.title: Complex attributes
reference.shortdesc: This is a temporary topic used to group topics about complex attributes that are in both DITA 2.0 and LwDITA. These topics appeared in the "Language reference" in the DITA 1.x spec, but are integrated into the "Architectural" section of the spec for DITA 2.0. It's unclear how this content will be handled in the LwDITA spec; do we just refer readers to "See that DITA 2.0 specification"? Only a handful of these topics have been edited and reviewed for DITA 2.0: format, href, and scope.
